name: clara-clips
description: MCP adapter for CLIPS expert system via Clara REST API
author: Clara Project

tools.name: clips.eval
tools.description: Evaluate CLIPS expressions and return results. Use this for calculations, function calls, and REPL interactions.

expression.description: CLIPS expression to evaluate (e.g., '(+ 1 2)' or '(printout t "hello world")')

tools.name: clips.query
tools.description: Query facts from the CLIPS knowledge base. Returns matching facts.

template.description: CLIPS template pattern to match (e.g., '(myfact ?x ?y)' to find all myfact instances)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 100)

tools.name: clips.assert
tools.description: Assert one or more facts into the CLIPS knowledge base.

facts.description: Array of fact templates to assert (e.g., ['(myfact 1 "value")', '(myfact 2 "other")'])

tools.name: clips.reset
tools.description: Reset the CLIPS engine to initial state, clearing all facts and rules.

preserve_globals.description: If true, preserve global variable values during reset (default: false)

tools.name: clips.status
tools.description: Get the current status of the CLIPS engine, including facts and session information.

REST_API_URL.description: Base URL of the Clara REST API
